summary: Dawne C. Miller was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in multiple payroll and certification reports from 1978. These documents provide her name, and in some cases, her social security number, annual salary, and gross pay for specific periods. The documents indicate her employment with the SCAS during the period from April to December 1978.
significance: Dawne C. Miller's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the specific nature and extent of her role are not detailed in these documents.
